DOC.brief_summary: To assess efficacy 24-week treatment quetiapine patient schizophrenia schizoaffective disorder
DOC.criteria: The patient patient 's legal representative ( ) must understand nature study must give write consent The patient suffers schizophrenia schizoaffective disorder accord DSMIVTR The patient 18 65 year old ( extremes include ) On basis physical neurological examination , medical history , patient , investigator 's opinion , otherwise healthy If subject female childbearing potential , must pregnant breastfeed use reliable method contraception . Reliable method may include abstinence , hormonal contraceptive ( eg , oral contraceptive longterm injectable implantable hormonal contraceptive ) , doublebarrier method ( eg , condom diaphragm , condom foam , condom sponge ) , intrauterine device , tubal ligation The patient know hypersensitivity quetiapine
